channel.title: Uncategorized on Nick
channel.description: Recent content in Uncategorized on Nick

item.title: HTPC v3 – Software RAID, Encryption, Backup
item.description: Create (virtual) block device. Create GPT tables rather than on RAW disk. gdisk /dev/sdX new partion, accept default starting sector, -100MB end sector, FD00 type Create encrypted virtual block device.

item.title: Windows 7 Setup
item.description: Install skinny network drivers Install Chrome, Firefox Install skinny graphics drivers Install Truecrypt Veracrypt, encrypt system drive Install Microsoft Security Essentials Taskbar buttons: Combine when taskbar is full Recycle bin: 1024MB max instead of percentage Disable System Restore Disable Aero Shake Show all file extensions Disable automatic restarts on updates
